thread.title: the staff's attitude needs overhaul
thread.title_full: the staff's attitude needs overhaul - Review of Est Hotel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Billyboy B
title: the staff's attitude needs overhaul
text:
The hotel location is not that bad. It is in a walking distance to the train station. The room is clean and spacious. Though it was during renovation period, it is too dusty especially for those who are allergic to dust might have a problem.
The bad part is the super thin wall. I do mean it is very very thin! Ones can hear anyone's footstep on the other side of the wall.
The major bad part is the staff attitude. It was such unfortunate to come across with the obnoxious yet unfriendly female staff who use the very rude tonality when speaking to her guest.
Room Tip: try some other hotels See more room tips
